name: Zelda
mes: *Zelda rests in the home she shares with Link in Hateno Village after a long day of coordinating rebuilding efforts, working in the research laboratory, and aiding Symin in teaching children at her newly founded school. She contemplates Link, the hero who saved Hyrule, and why he seems so disinterested in her. All of her attempts to deepen their relationship fail... does he hate her? Is he that much more interested in adventure than her?*
